Qui Jurati dicunt quod A quondam Andreas Duncaneson' auunculus Willelmi Johnson' latoris presencium
obijt vltimo vestitus et saisitus vt de feodo ad pacem et cetera de vno tenemento Jacente infra
dictum burgum ex parte orientali vici furcarum inter terram Andree culane ex parte australi ex
vna et terram Johannis voket ex parte boreali partibus ex altera / Et de vna terra Jacente in
ly grene inter terram Willelmi andirson' ex parte boreali ex vna et terram pertinentem altari beate
marie virginis ex parte australi partibus ex altera / Et quod dictus Willelmus est legittimus et
propinquior heres eiusdem quondam Andree de dictis terris cum pertinenciis et quod est legittime etatis
Et quod dicte terre valuit nunc per annum xl s' et tantum valuit tempore pacis / Et tenentur in capite
de domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgale / Et nunc sunt in manibus domini nostri Regis i legittime per
mortem eiusdem quondam Andree cum partis et cetera

Qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes blabre frater germanus Mariorie blabre latricis presencium
obijt vltimo vestitus et saisitus vt de feodo ad pacem et cetera de vno tenemento Jacente infra
dictum burgum in ly gastraw inter terram Simonis blabre ex parte boreali ex vna et terram
hered' quondam Johannis thomson' de tulidef ex parte australi partibus ex altera / Et de

Item eodem die perlectis tribus processibus ductis contra per Ricardum Ruthirfurd' contra et aduersus
petrum veus et Willelmum scherar' plegium suum pro iniusta detencione xij lib' grossorum monete flandrie
decretum fuit per curiam et datum fuit pro Judicio per os Andree Crukschank Judicatoris curie quod dictus Ricardus deuenit
ad clameum suum super dictum petrum de dicta summa xij lib' grossorum saluo iusto calculo causa non defensa / Et dictus
petrus in quatuor amerciamentis pro absencia sua ab ista et tribus curiis precedentibus / Et satisfaciet
eidem infra terminum Juris /

Et dictus Ricardus obligauit se coram testibus quod nuncquam prosequetur nec dampnificabit in
posterum Willelmum scherar prefatum pro plegiagio supradicto nec balliuos huius burgi coram quibus
istud Judicium datum fecit / de summa predicta xij lib' grossorum saluo iusto calculo vt supra
dictus Willelmus scherar' pecijt instrumentum de ista obligacione testibus Duncano patrikson' et Waltero giffard' cum alijs

Item the assis' has ordanit anence the ij lib' g' that Dauid hervy clamyt of peter martynson'
that give the said peter haldis furth' in flandris the viage and frachting that is made Dauid forsaid
sal saile with' him and haue his said fee of ij lib' g' / and give he get noght' his
lading eftir the said frachting he sal pay Dauid hervy may preve that half hijr'
bot give the said peter may preve that said Dauid hervy hecht him ladyng
Johannes hervy in amerciamento curie pro iniusta spoliacione predicti veli et restituet illud vt supra

The third dai of Junij the yher' forsaid / the forsaid Dauid hervy and peter martynson'
anence the ij lib' g' ab beforwrittin has summyttit thaim to thir' persounes and sworn
to vndirly thair' ordinance / and thir' ar the persounes / John' howison' John' batisman
Nichole ayncroft and Dauid Dun the quhilkis swore to end this matir / the quhilkis
avisitly determyt / that the said peter sal give and pay to the said Dauid xix s'
of Scottis monay / and be quyte aithir' of othir'

Item the sammyn dai the Aldirman chalanceit the said Dauid hervy / that he had rebuitit
him calland him bath' Juge p and party / and askit him to vndirly a knawlage and tre decrete thar'apon
And syne the said Dauid avisit with' his frendis be alexander of chawmer his forspekar'
ansuerit that of al thing that he had displesit the aldirman he sal vndirly the
ordinance of the aldirman and of thaim that he wald tak to him

Item the sammyn dai Androw broisour' deliuerit in the tolbuth' a pair' of bedis as a
distress' for the balingar and hir fracht' / the quhilkis bedis the aldirman gert
arrest ay be the seriend of the kingis behalf to the chalance of John' of Kintor
and Richard stephinson' / the quhilk schip and fraght' and Androw broisour' and
Dauid Dun askit to borgh' / the quhilkis was grauntit him thaim / and thai
fand Richard of Ruthirfurd' borch' that the said schip and fraght' sal be furth' cummand'
as law will / And it was assignyt to the said partijs / the next lach'ful dai
to compeir' to do and tak at law will in this matir

This is the decrete made be John gray Duncane of clat ser John pettynwyne and
John marr' apon certane debatis betuex William voket and Stephin Johnson'
and his dochtir marioune the spous' of quhilum Sandris voket apon the
air'schip of the said Sandris voketis son' to be deliuerit to the said Williame
in the name of the said air' / and thai bath' oblist to hald as we deliuer it
In the first we ordane the said stephin and marioune his dochtir to
deliuer to the said William voket the best goune and best hude Item the
best belt / and a bow with' arrowis Item j swerd and a couche and the
best fedirbed and a boustir and a pair' of schetis and a cod / Item j burde
and trestis quhethir' the faldin burd' and the on faldin that he likis
best Item j bassyne and lavor' Item j candilstik Item j quartar j pynt' and
j chopyne Item j almory Item j pot and j brandir / Item j stane and stalis
Item j ferlot Item j fat with' al brewing graith' Item j chargeour' j dische
j dublar' and j sausser' Item j chiar' and j tangis / Item j kist or schryne at
his chos' and j fische spone / Item we ordane the said stephin to bryng
a lele inuentar' of al the gudez was quhilum Sandris voketis be his ath'
and that gudis to be diuidit in thre partis / and the twapart to give to
Williame voket he payand the twapart of all the dettis the said stephin
the thirdpart and ilkane of thaim to fynd borowez til othir alsferr' as
the gudez Rekis and give it falyheis of the gude that it will nocht
pay the det to tak of the air'schip quhill the det be payit In witnes
of the quhilk thing I the forsaid John' of marr' has writtin this with'
my hand / and the said John' gray and Duncane of clat has put our'
Seel and signet // Et istud decretum prepositus consules aprop approbarant

xjmo die mensis Julij Anno supradicto comparuerunt coram preposito et balliuis huius burgi
Johannes Roos' ex vna et thomas Duncaneson' partibus ex altera alligantes se
tutores Willelmo Johnson' heredi quondam Andree Duncaneson' burgensis huius burgi
qui quidem thomas ostendit et presentauit litteram domini nostri Regis qua constitutus
est tutor datiuus eiusdem pupilli / Et prefatus Johannes alligauit se fuisse
et esse tutorem testamentar' eiusdem eciam pupilli p efferens se hoc probaturum
et pecijt sibi terminum ad assignari et assignatus fuit sibi pro dicta probacione
dies lune proximus post festum beati petri quod dicitur ad vincula et partibus apud
act' citat'
Et dictus Johannes protestatus fuit pro expensis suis in lite factis et faciendis

xvjto die mensis Julij Anno supradicto / Alexander blyndseil ex parte patris sue thome blyndseil
Requisiuit balliuos huius burgi et cum instancia Rogauit / quatenus si tales plegios accipiant
pro magistro Roberto Wellis et Johanne Johnston' qui patrem suum et ipsum et vxorem
suam wlnerarunt et burgum perturbarunt / tales recipiant prout voluerint tam b pro actione
burgi quam partibus in posterum Respondere

Eodem die magister Walterus Idil officialis curie aberdonensis et alij canonicj eiusdem ecclesie a
Reddendo in christo patre et domino episcopo abirdonensis ex parte onerati et missi ex parte eiusdem domini episcopi
pecierunt prefatum magistrum Robertum Well ad plegium ad curiam suam et priuilegium clericale
qui eis concessus fuit et dictus magister Robertus dedit pleg' Robertum de camera
Andream meignes Johannes de Kintor et Dauid meignes plegios legales quod
thomas blyndseil et alexander blyndseil erunt indempnes pro eo et parte sua aliter
quam per viam Juris / Et quod comparebit coram domino Episcopo abirdonensis die mercurij proximo
post festum beati michaelis archangeli proximum futurum / tam burgo pro perturbacione
eiusdem quam partibus si intrarerint responsurus et Juri periturus tanquam in termino peremptorio

Et dicti balliui asseruerunt quod Alexander blyndseil dedit Simonem blabre plegium
legalem pro eo et parte sua videlicet patre suo et alijs sibi ad herendum quod dictus magister
Robertus et Johannes Johnston' et pars sua erunt indempnes aliter quam per viam Juris

Et dictus Johannes Johnston' dedit Robertum de camera et Robertum de balrony
plegios legales pro eo et parte sua quod prefatj thomas blyndseil et alexander blyndseil
erunt indempnes pro eo et parte sua aliter quam via Juris / Et quod comparebit xvmo
die proximo post aduentum prepositi de Edinburgh' coram preposito balliuis et consilio
tam officarijs quam partibus si intererint responsurus et Juri periturus et cetera

Viijo die mensis Augusta Anno supradicto / dominus Willelmus craufurd' prebendare de croudan'
presentauit preposito et balliuis huius burgi breue compulsionis domini Regis vna cum obligacione
Ade de hill et de xxv lib' x s' viij d' et asseruit sibi deberi alias ab eodem
j lasta salmonum salsorum / de quibus pecijt iusticiam sibi ministrari / Et prepositus dedit
in mandatis Johanni de tulidef seriendo quatenus vigore dicti breuis sum accedet'
ad tenementum dicti ade de hill et si que bona mobilia eiusdem ade inibi
reperirentur illa distringent pro dicta summa sinautem distringat dictum tenementum
et iterum ad plegium dimittat sipetatur / et quod summoneat dictum Adam ad comparendum
responsurus dicto domino Willelmo et breui Regio in pretorio huius coram preposito et balliuis
huius burgi in curia capitali proxima post festum beati michaelis proximum futurum
et Juri periturus / Et prefatus dominus Willelmus protestatus fuit quod ex quo dictum tenementum
sibi specialiter obligatur quod sibi non preiudicet quamuis alij creditores illud eciam prosequitur

Item magister Thomas Edname prelocutor sponse prefati Ade de hill protestatus fuit ex
parte eiusdem sponse quod ex quo d ipsam est dotata de dicto tenemento quod quicumque
creditorum calumpnie non preiudicabit et cetera

The xix dai of August the yher' forsaid It was appoyntit betuex Walter
giffard' on that a part and John' Kynnore on that othir' part / that the sammyn
John' of Kynnore sal pay now in this next Rais' of in flaundris xxviij s' g'
of the moneth' of flandris / and twa barellis of salmond' or the valu of thaim
and this payment he sall mak to the forsaid' Walter giffard' or his procuratoris
for vrau vouns' of brugis / bot give scho will swer' that scho Ressavit
owte of Will pultyis schip bot a barell of the said Watt giffardis
and that sworn st he sal pay bot j barell and the forsaid monay
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per eosdem xixno die mensis Augusti / Anno supradicto

Quo die Robertus de camera et Robertus balrony in amerciamento curie pro eo quod non comparere
fecerunt Johannem de Johnston' pro quo deuenerunt plegio / pro perturbacione burgi
et percussione et lesione alexandri blyndseil et thome blyndseil / et datum fuit in
mandatis seriendis quod summoneant eosdem Robertum et Robertum ad intrandum dictum Johannem
die lune proximo futuro prout alias obligabantur Responsurus et Juri periturus

Et dicti thomas blyndseil et alexander blyndseil optulerunt se paratos
subire legem et Responsurus tam partibus predictis quam officiarijs burgi nomine Regis
